name: Life Passes You By (Cosmo)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51, 'Every 10 seconds'.

Note, this game is incredibly short. You should be done in 5 minutes.

In Life Passes You by, every 10 seconds 10 years of your life occurs. You only have moments to make bold decisions that will affect the direction of your life, or you can simply choose to not act at all.. and let life pass you by.

This is a game about opportunities, regret and the beauty of life.
